topic.title: 1.1.1 Mounting Hoisting Attachments for Hoisting Crane

header.para: Mounting Hoisting Attachments for Hoisting Crane

li.text: Assemble the hoisting attachments as shown in the figure above.
Lift the assembled hoisting attachments by the main wire rope [2] using a crane and move it near the machine.
Insert the front [6] and rear [7] lifting bars into the machine casting as shown below.
Rotate the front [6] and rear [7] lifting bars to orientate the locking pins as shown below.

para.style: text-align:center; margin-bottom:7px;

list.style: margin-bottom:8px; line-height:1.50; page-break-before:always; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: The completed hoisting assembly is shown below

para.style: text-align:center; margin-bottom:10px;
text-align:center; margin-bottom:15px;
para.text: Figure <%HMFIGURECOUNTER2=1%>.<%HMFIGURECOUNTER%> Hoisting Attachment Assembly for Standard Machine

para.style: text-align:center; margin-bottom:15px;
text-align:center; margin-bottom:15px;
para.text: Figure <%HMFIGURECOUNTER2=1%>.<%HMFIGURECOUNTER%> Hoisting Attachment Assembly for APC Machine

para.text: This completes the mounting of the hoisting attachments.
